duties_responsibilities.duty: Handle billing, collections, and account maintenance for utility accounts, providing exceptional customer service and attention to detail.
Respond to customer inquiries and provide assistance related to utility accounts and services.
Maintain accurate records, process payments, and manage account adjustments as needed.
Ensure compliance with billing and accounting procedures while resolving customer issues and complaints effectively.
Assist in the development and implementation of procedures to improve billing and collection processes.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or its equivalent
